title: The new System of honor
body:
I know there is a new honor system coming up and I was just wondering if someone knows what would happen to the ribbon people already earned.
I got the same Green Ribbon for 3 years and I kinda dont want to lose it.

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure what's going to happen with those past honor ribbons quite yet since those details haven't been announced yet. Porocles and I will be sure to post updates as soon as we get that info though!
